Package project.view.splendor

Class VerticalPlayerInfoGui

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.VBox
project.view.splendor.VerticalPlayerInfoGui
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, PlayerInfoGui
public class VerticalPlayerInfoGui extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox implements PlayerInfoGui
A class to visually represent a player in the game (vertical layout of player info).
